name: Two Worlds Apart
description:
Two Worlds Apart  is a randomized matching-puzzle prototype with two mini-maps associated with two lovers, created in Global Game Jam 2022. There are two lovers in the same world who cannot see each other due to their colors. Help them to find each other by matching their positions. 

Control 

Black Person (on the left) - WASD

White Person (on the right) - IJKL
